text: I’m so excited to see you!
Thank you for agreeing to come along with me on such a short notice!
You see~ my friend Darwin said that he needs help watching over the Jungle kingdom while the king is away.
Prince Julius has been put in charge all by himself~ and needs as much help as he can get!
I know how reliable you are~ friend~ that's why I'm so happy you agreed to come along with us!
Plus~ this jungle is full of exciting games so I know that we’ll have so much fun!
Let's find our way to Jungle Island explorer!
Start the engine by pressing the blue button.
Now let's look for the island.
To do that turn the steering wheel until you spot the island.
I know you can do it explorer!
Let’s make sure this is Jungle Island!
Move the picture of the island to the outline.
Now~ move the throttle up to drive us to the Island!
If so say Aye Aye Captain!
Hmm.. it seems that your microphone is broken explorer.
Press the microphone button to continue.
Good Job! Now honk the horn to let the boathouse know that we’re here explorer!
We still have work to do on the island!
It wouldn't hurt to go on a little boat ride.
Do you want to go on another boat ride explorer?
Then we better get back to the task at hand~ explorer!
Alright explorer! Do you remember how to start the engine?
Start the engine by pressing the blue button.
Alright explorer! Now that the engine has started~ it’s time to find the island!
Now~ let's look for the island. To do that~ turn the steering wheel until you spot the island. I know you can do it explorer!
Do you remember what to do next explorer?
Alright explorer!  Let’s make sure this is Jungle Island! Move the picture of the island to the outline.
Excellent job explorer! Now~ it’s time to make our way to the island!
Now~ move the throttle up to drive us to the Island!
Alright explorer! We’re approaching the lighthouse again! Do you remember what we’re supposed to do next?
Remember to honk the horn to let the boathouse know that we’re here explorer!
Thank you for the boat ride!
It’s nice to take a break once and a while.
When you're ready~ come on out so we can get back to work.
Do you want to go on another boat ride explorer?
Then would you like to play on the ship?
Just come on out when you’re ready!
Then we better get back to the task at hand~ explorer!
Welcome to the Jungle kingdom explorer!
I’m so excited to learn and help out my friend!
I can't wait for you to meet him!
Oh! There he is up ahead!
Hello Darwin! It’s been a while!
Hi there Red! It’s good to see you!
see you have others with you.
And this here is the explorer! They’re super smart and can't wait to help and learn!
Hi to the both of you! As Red said earlier my name is
You see… I used to be the king's most trusted….
However… Adventure was calling my name and I just had to see what’s out there!
Red was saying earlier that the king is away? Why is that?
Yes yes the king is away to…
The king went out to help another kingdom in need!
How silly of me to forget.
I even remember when he had Julius!
I can’t wait to see him again!
I don’t know if I can do this guys...
I’m a bit nervous to run this kingdom on my own…
But there's some perks to that though…
Since you are the future king you can do anything you want! Haha!
the whole kingdom is yours to do as you please…
You can do anything your little heart desires my prince!
Yes~ anything you want...take your frustration and nerves out on this village…
This is what you're supposed to do...
This is your playground my prince!
I can do as I want!
And I can do what I want!
Which means I can do what I want!
If this is the prince we’re supposed to help
I wonder what's gotten into him...
But he’s never acted out like…
So this type of behavior is new for him?
Then we must catch up to him and figure out what’s wrong!
Darwin~ you know the prince the most.
Can you think of anything that’ll help him?
Perhaps Julius has forgotten about how good he really is…
Then maybe you can help him remember!
I can’t seem to remember anything specific…
With this mess I can’t seem to think straight!
My friends and I can clean up while you think on things!
Besides~ we shouldn't leave things messy anyway!
I’ll leave it to you guys!
Maybe we’ll learn things while doing so!

file name: //Darwin STAYS onscreen from the last part and now moves to the middle to talk to the player.

text: Let me help you navigate the area.
tap on me when you're ready!
Hey wait! Not so fast explorer.
Come talk to me so I can prepare you for the challenges you’ll face!
Are you ready to get started explorer?
Okay explorer~ come back when you are ready.
Hmm… I can’t seem to remember…
I’m sure I’ll think of something soon explorer…
Wow! Look at all the coins you received!
Tap on it and let's see what happens!
I think there’s someone you’ll still need to meet before we move forward...
and I absolutely love making stickers!
I see you’ve got some coins there!
I'll tell you what~ if you give me three coins I’ll make you a one of a kind sticker!
I promise you won't find another kind like it!
Why don't we try for one now!
Alright! Here you go! Now drag your sticker to the board to place it!
You can only place your sticker once~ so when you hit yes~
Now if you ever run out of space you can remove stickers!
However! Once you remove a sticker you can't get it back.
If you ever want to place your stickers or view your collection~
call for me again and click the stickerboard!
If you have the funds you can also buy more boards to place your stickers on!
I have MANY cool boards from my travels! so help yourself!
so call me with the cart button if you ever need me again!
Hold your stickers there explorer! You’re all out of inventory space.
Why don't you place some stickers or buy more boards to make room before you try to roll again!
Hmm~ a mighty fine sticker indeed!
A cute little thing! Can’t wait to make more for yah!
That’s a pretty cool sticker explorer!
I’m pretty proud of this one explorer!
I've never made a sticker like this one!
Not often do my stickers come out like this
Take care of this one explorer~ it’s a rare one!
I’ve never made a cutie like this before!
Can’t believe how good it looks!
Does this mean you’re getting your memories back? Will they be able to help the prince?
It’s been so long that it makes remembering harder…
But with the village being all cleaned up it’s making it easier!
I’m going to run up ahead and try to catch up to the prince!
I see Darwin isn't with you.
He went on ahead to look for you.
You guys are getting in the way.
One of you will step up and accept my challenge.
you can move forward and bother me some more.
We have no choice but to accept.
The explorer will be the one to challenge you.
They have been learning so much!
It’s time to put what you've learned to the test!
HOW DARE YOU DO THIS TO THE FUTURE KING!
How dare you win fair and square…
Enough out of you! You buffon!
I knew you could do it!
Next time you won't be so lucky!
I don't know why he’s acting this way.
I’m sure we’ll find out in time.

file name: // this ones a wild one. Visually I'd like the bg to undim but bars stay in place after the last segment so they we can watch the tiger sign post spring in place. Then the bg dims for talkies again but the sign stays OVER the dim so it's in focus letting Red speak on the left as if to look at it.

text: If you tap on it~ you can probably play the princes challenge games!
You should try it when you want to practice your skills!
Show them who is in charge!
I'll be generous and let you challenge me again.
You won't be able to beat my friends.
Are you ready to lose explorer!?
Come back when you're ready for my victory!
Time for me to beat you I guess…
Well would you look at that…
It looks like I win explorer…
You want to challenge me again?
It looks like they destroyed this area as well
Let’s clean up before moving forward!
I told you we’d see each other again soon.
The challenge is about to begin!
you can keep getting in my way and move forward.
you have to leave me alone~ and let me do what I want!
It seems we don't have another choice.
Show them what you're made of!
I knew you could do it!
You won't beat me next time! I promise!
let's move forward and find Darwin!
Hopefully he’s thought of something to help the prince.
I agree~ let's hope he does.
It looks like they destroyed this area as well...
Let's go over and talk to him.
and my village is in shambles.
W-wait! That wasn't us! It was-
I don't want to hear it.
Clean this up~ then I’ll listen.
We were already planning on it sir!
Well it’s a pleasure to meet you Clogg!
My name is Red and this is Wally!
They did most of the work!
I thank you for cleaning my Village~
If you wish to explain~ now I will listen.
we came to your kingdom to help the prince while the king.
But~ our friend Darwin is up ahead of us!
He used to be the king's advisor.
We’re hoping he is able to come up with something to stop the prince's behavior.
I see you were able to put the village back together again.
You have no right to speak to the future king!
No right to speak after being spoken to.
What is the meaning of this!?
The future king is simply doing what he is allowed to do!
Do not lecture your future king!
you can keep getting in my way and move forward.
you have to leave me alone and let me do what I want!
Show the prince all that you've learned!
I knew you could do it!
How dare you make a mockery of the future king!
I’m sure we’ll see them again soon.
I see… So it really was the prince.
It does seem a bit strange that a prince would do this to their own kingdom.
I worry for the future of this kingdom.
Maybe the tigers aren't fit to rule.
We’re on a mission to help the pince~ and stop this!
Thank you for fixing my village.
You may come and go as you please.
I just started remembering all of the good times I had here~
and I just couldn't stop myself!
Well we’re together now so that’s what’s important.
Well umm if it means anything…
Taking that walk has reminded me of so many things that the prince did when he was a cub!
remind him of the good heart he has!
Listen Julius~ you don't have to do this…
You have no right to speak to the prince!
This is my kingdom! I can do as I please!
I don’t need you to lecture me!
At least listen to what Darwin has to say!
do you remember when you were little and there was a festival in the Gorilla Village?
The village was getting all decorated~
but there weren't enough villagers to help.
And you took it upon yourself to help put the streamers up?
To help the villagers in your kingdom?
I must say that just because you helped out those commoners~
doesn't mean you can’t do as you want!
You helped them because you wanted to~
but you can do whatever you want to their silly little village because you can!
They should be grateful that you even paid that village any attention at all!
Hey now! That’s not very nice!
This is my kingdom! I can do whatever I want!
Silence! It doesn't matter what you think!
IT DOESN'T MATTER! THIS IS MY KINGDOM!
